data.name: Big Farm Story - Peaceful Nature Pack
data.detailed_description:
There is no better designer than nature! Enjoy our new nature DLC that brings you the most beautiful furniture and decoration pieces as well as skins for your farm buildings.

Interior decorations
You’ve always wanted to live quietly in a corner of nature? Discover the most pure and natural furniture and decorations for your farm house. Relax in your new canopy bed, proof your green thumb with new plants and redecorate your home with a new pet bed, floor and wall design as well as a new seating area.

Exterior design
Turn your farm into a jungle! Transform your farm house, the windmill, the small and the big animal barn as well as the well with a pure and natural design. Give your farm the finishing touch with the most pure decorations, such as a bench, a clothesline and a lamp.

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Czech, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
